content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I need to first craft wheat. Wheat requires a hay block, which is located in slot 24. I will move the hay block to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the wheat, I will move it to an empty slot in the inventory (eg., slot 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have the wheat in the inventory, I will move it back to the crafting grid (slot 1) to craft the cookie.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have the wheat in the crafting grid, I will move the cocoa beans to the right of it (slot 2) to craft the cookie.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}]
thought: Now that I have the cocoa beans in the crafting grid, I will move the wheat to the right of it (slot 3) to craft the cookie.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "cookie", "quantity": 8, "index": 0}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 7, "index": 11}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 8
